titleStmt.title: Set on the great pot a sermon upon hospitality / preach'd at a late visitation at Turnbridge in Kent on 2 Kings IV. 38 by H.C.
titleStmt.author: H. C. (Henry Cornwallis), 1654?-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Sons of the Prophets,
